data.title: LinkedIn
data.meta_description:
Alpina | 890 followers on LinkedIn. Where innovation meets tradition. | ALPINA is passionate about manufacturing footwear.
Based in Slovenia, in a pristine natural environment surrounded by forests, ALPINA is a brand name that guarantees high-quality craftsmanship, unconventional solutions, and functional design. Among its many product ranges, ALPINA is globally best known as the first choice of Olympic and World Cup winners in cross-country skiing races.
data.text:
Halard Amundsen Re-signs with Alpina for 2024/25 Season! We are excited to share that Halard Amundsen, the best cross-country skier of the 2023-24 season, has extended his contract with Alpina for another year! Halard's remarkable achievements and consistent top performances have solidified his position as a leader in the sport. His choice to continue with Alpina highlights the trust and confidence he places in our cutting-edge equipment, particularly the XC Elite 3.0 boots. We look forward to supporting Halard as he continues to push the boundaries of excellence in cross-country skiing. Stay tuned for more updates on his journey and upcoming competitions. #AlpinaSports #CrossCountrySkiing #HalardAmundsen #Elite3.0 #SkiSeason2024 #InnovationInSports #AthletePartnerships

‚õ∞ We are extremely happy and proud to be part of this year's "GREMO V HRIBE" project. In collaboration with Pivovarna La≈°ko, we have launched a #limitededition hiking boot inspired by the legendary Alpina hiking boots from the 1970s. This special boot also features a beautiful edelweiss, symbolizing our shared love for the mountains. We will be with you at all "GREMO V HRIBE" events, with the next one taking place this Saturday at Planinska koƒça on Boƒç. With some perseverance and luck, one of the participants in the "GREMO V HRIBE" events will receive these unique hiking boots at the end of the hikes. ‚õ∞

üöÄ Exciting News from Alpina! üöÄ We are thrilled to announce the official opening of our new facilities in Zhongshan, China! Established in 2005, Alpina Zhongshan has been producing high-quality footwear, and this new state-of-the-art building will enhance our operational efficiency and working conditions. With modernized machinery and improved audit processes, we are set to meet higher customer demands and ensure superior product quality. The relocation, supported by our new owners, was celebrated by Mr. Frantisek Pivoda (one of the owners), Ms. Amadea Kavƒçiƒç Jesenovec (CEO), and Mr. Miha Gantar (Director of Alpina Zhongshan). We are confident these advancements will boost productivity and quality. Stay tuned for more updates! üì∑ Bostjan Lukancic #Alpina #NewFacilities #Innovation #Quality #Productivity #Footwear #Manufacturing #Zhongshan #China

We are thrilled to share that we recently hosted a highly successful sales meeting of our team of WALKING Division at Alpina. Gathering our force together was not only an exciting opportunity to align our strategies, but also a chance to reinforce our team's camaraderie and commitment. Key Highlights: Strategic Discussions: Our sales meeting provided a platform for in-depth discussions on market trends, customer insights, and sales strategies. By sharing experiences and insights, we're better equipped to navigate the evolving market landscape. Product Showcase: We unveiled our latest products and innovations, giving our team firsthand experience with our newest offerings in the OUTDOOR segment. This hands-on approach helps our sales force understand our products inside and out, enabling them to better serve our customers. Networking and Relationship Building: One of the most valuable aspects of our sales meeting was the opportunity for networking and relationship building. Connecting with partners from different regions fosters collaboration and idea-sharing, strengthening our team dynamic. Hosting our sales meeting was an important milestone for us, and we're excited about the opportunities it brings. As we continue to innovate and grow, we remain focused on our commitment to excellence and delivering value to our customers. Thank you to everyone who contributed to the success of our sales meeting. Here's to a bright future ahead! https://lnkd.in/diSvwcqN #SalesMeeting #TeamBuilding #SalesStrategy #CompanyCulture #Innovation #Networking #LinkedIn Alpina d.o.o.
